channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street Light Out (again), 21st December
item.description:
Street Light outside 52 / 54 Roberts Road is not working. Previously reported in October and fixed but now broken again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Roberts Road, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken pedestrian crossing sensor causing needless red lights on Benhall sliproad, 21st December
item.description:
Pedestrian sensor is broken, missing cover, exposed wiring and electronics causing the lights to repeatedly turn red causing delays on the bus lane and slip road to Benhall - as well as delaying A40 Westbound.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Lights are red for no reason

item.title: There may be no problem but tree looks to be leaning quite a bit so I thought it might be worth someone checking it!, 21st December
item.description:

item.title: Street Light not working, 21st December
item.description:

item.title: Two storm/surface water drains at the roadside in lower Naunton Lane are blocked with tree/leaf debris. This area has been subjected to 2 insurance claim losses in the recent past,, 21st December
item.description:
Between Whitecross Square and Thirlstaine Road on the west side of the highway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bath Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Several potholes in edge of road., 21st December
item.description:
Approx 50m downhill from Romanhurst Cottage. The potholes recently reported as being repaired have re-appeared. Flowing water appears to have washed out the repair.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath impassable, 21st December
item.description:
The footpath running along Frogfurlong ln is impassable. After the rain is muddy, bushes along the path are poorly maintained and makes it difficult even to walk. A proper pavement would help the use of the path, considering the possibility to make the track suitable for cycling would improve the street traffic safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frog Furlong Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 roadside drains appeared blocked in the area outside 15 Porchester Road. Leaves from trees by Wotton brook have caused blockages previously, gutters are rarely cleaned and perpetuate problem., 21st December
item.description:
From outside 9 Porchester road down to 23. Short, sharp shower caused flooding in photo.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynmouth Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are fallen trees (as many as 4) which are obstructing this path in Syreford Plantation., 21st December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Syreford Road, Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes on slip road into Cudnall St from Cirencester Road, 21st December
item.description:
Multiple potholes on slip road into Cudnall St from Cirencester Road. Vehicles forced to go over potholes because of parking along this road, which also forces vehicles into oncoming traffic on a blind bend. Please fix the pot holes and add double yellow lines. Itâ€™s so dangerous!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langton Place, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold
